content: वै {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (वायति) {@--1@} To dry, be dried. {@--2@} To be languid or weary, be exhausted.

वै {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A particle of affirmation or certainty (indeed, truly, forsooth), but it is generally used as an expletive; आपो वै नरसूनवः <ls>Ms. 1. 10</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 231</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 78.</ls> &c. It is also said to be a vocative particle, and sometimes shows entreaty or persuasion (अनुनय).
